mapper.insert: insert into member(Mnum, Member_name, Member_id, Member_passwd, Member_Tel, Member_address, Member_email, Member_birth, Member_sex, Member_preferred1, Member_preferred2, Member_preferred3,Member_authority, cash) values(seq_member.nextval, #{Member_name}, #{Member_id}, #{Member_passwd}, #{Member_Tel}, #{Member_address}, #{Member_email}, #{Member_birth}, #{Member_sex}, #{Member_preferred1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Member_preferred2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Member_preferred3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Member_authority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0)
mapper.select: select * from member where Member_id=#{Member_id} and Member_Tel=#{Member_Tel}
mapper.update: update member set cash=cash+#{cash} where Mnum=#{mnum}
update member set Member_authority=#{Member_authority} where Mnum = #{mnum}
mapper.select: select * from novel where Novel_subject like '%#{searchString}%'
select * from novel where Novel_memberName like '%#{searchString}%'
